titleStmt.title: The guardian, a comedie acted before Prince Charls, His Highness at Trinity-Colledg in Cambridge, upon the twelfth of March, 1641 / written by Abraham Cowley.
titleStmt.author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.

notesStmt.note: Altered by Cowley and published in 1663 under title: Cutter of Coleman Street.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
